languages.text: "Как и чести. Ими движет не благородство, а бездумно заученные статьи! Я бы на их месте казнил поганца на месте и дело с концом".
"Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."
languages.original_text: "Как и чести. Ими движет не благородство, а бездумно заученные статьи! Я бы на их месте казнил поганца на месте и дело с концом".

traits.locale_text: "Nor honor. They are driven not by nobility but by unthinkingly memorised articles! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."
"Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."
"Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."
"Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."
"Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

languages.text: "Und auch keine Ehre. Sie folgen keinen hehren Idealen, sondern auswendig gelernten Artikeln. An ihrer Stelle würde ich den Halunken auf der Stelle töten und gut."
languages.original_text: "Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: "Und auch keine Ehre. Sie folgen keinen hehren Idealen, sondern auswendig gelernten Artikeln. An ihrer Stelle würde ich den Halunken auf der Stelle töten und gut."

languages.text: « Ni d'honneur. Ce n'est pas la noblesse d'âme qui motive leurs décisions, mais seulement des articles qu'ils ont appris par cœur et qu'ils appliquent sans réfléchir ! À leur place, j'exécuterais ce scélérat sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: « Ni d'honneur. Ce n'est pas la noblesse d'âme qui motive leurs décisions, mais seulement des articles qu'ils ont appris par cœur et qu'ils appliquent sans réfléchir ! À leur place, j'exécuterais ce scélérat sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: “也没有荣誉感。那群人根本不懂何为高贵，做事不过脑子，只会遵守那些死记硬背下来的东西。如果换做是我，我会当场处决那个人渣，一了百了。”
languages.original_text: "Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: “也没有荣誉感。那群人根本不懂何为高贵，做事不过脑子，只会遵守那些死记硬背下来的东西。如果换做是我，我会当场处决那个人渣，一了百了。”

languages.text: «Ni tienen honor. No les guía la nobleza, ¡sino unos artículos memorizados sin pensarlos! En su lugar, habría ejecutado al malandrín en el acto».
languages.original_text: "Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: «Ni tienen honor. No les guía la nobleza, ¡sino unos artículos memorizados sin pensarlos! En su lugar, habría ejecutado al malandrín en el acto».

languages.text: 「名誉もない。やつらを動かしているのは気高さではなく、何も考えずに覚えた条文だけだ！もし私が彼らなら、あんな悪党はその場で処刑して終わりにしているさ」
languages.original_text: "Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: 「名誉もない。やつらを動かしているのは気高さではなく、何も考えずに覚えた条文だけだ！もし私が彼らなら、あんな悪党はその場で処刑して終わりにしているさ」

languages.text: "Haysiyetsizler de. Asalete değil, körü körüne ezberledikleri maddelere göre hareket ediyorlar! Ben olsam o alçağı oracıkta idam ederdim, mesele biterdi."
languages.original_text: "Nor honour. They are driven not by nobility but by articles memorised without thought! If I were them, I would execute the scoundrel on the spot and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: "Haysiyetleri de yok. Asalet değil, körü körüne ezberledikleri maddelere göre hareket ediyorlar! Ben olsam o alçağı oracıkta idam ederdim, mesele biterdi."
